original_title: The Day Jimmy's Boa Ate the Wash
overview: It starts off as an ordinary class trip to the farm - boring, kind of dull. But before very long, chaos takes over as one zany incident leads to another, even zanier, one. Soon the entire farm is uproariously out of control.
tagline: Jimmy's boa constrictor wreaks havoc on the class trip to a farm.
title: The Day Jimmy's Boa Ate the Wash
